title: Annual Sports Day
description: Annual Sports Day will be held on 25th April in the school ground.

title: Parent-Teacher Meeting
description: PTM is scheduled for all classes on 20th April from 9 AM to 12 PM.

title: Summer Vacation
description: Summer vacation will begin from 1st May and school will reopen on 15th June.

title: School Magazine Submission
description: Last date to submit articles for school magazine is 22nd April.

title: Science Exhibition
description: Science exhibition for Class 6-10 will be held on 28th April.

title: Yoga Day Celebration
description: Students should come in sports uniform for Yoga Day on 21st June.

title: Exam Time Table Release
description: Mid-term exam time table will be released on 30th April.

title: Library Week
description: Library week will be observed from 5th to 10th May with various activities.

title: English Debate Competition
description: Debate competition will be conducted on 27th April in the auditorium.

title: Vaccination Drive
description: Free vaccination for students of Class 1 to 5 on 24th April.

title: Earth Day Activities
description: Eco club to organize plantation drive on Earth Day (22nd April).

title: Fees Submission Reminder
description: Last date to submit school fees for Q1 is 30th April.

title: Dance Workshop
description: Dance workshop for interested students from 26th to 29th April.

title: Scholarship Exam
description: Scholarship exam for Class 8 and 10 on 2nd May.

title: New Admission Orientation
description: Orientation program for new students on 23rd April.

title: Lab Maintenance Week
description: All labs will remain closed for maintenance from 1st to 3rd May.

title: Teacher's Training Session
description: Training session for teachers on 19th April at 3 PM.

title: Art & Craft Exhibition
description: Art & craft exhibition in main hall on 29th April.

title: Online Classes Schedule
description: New online class schedule will be shared on 18th April.

title: Holiday Notice
description: School will remain closed on 1st May due to Labour Day.
